narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
The applicant has met the licensing requirements and wishes to be a class "B" dealer.  The applicant will mail a
check for the licensing fee to the Animal Care Eastern Regional office in Raleigh, NC.
Record keeping requirements were discussed during the time of inspection.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES ALLOWED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.

species.common: TURKISH SPINY MOUSE / AFRICAN SPINY MOUSE
